titles: By vertue of severall ordinances of Parliament, authorizing the Committee of the Militia of London and liberties thereof, ...
author: City of London (England). Committee for the Militia.
notes: Title from opening lines of text.
Signed: Adam Banckes Clerk to the said Committee.
An order of the Committee of the Militia of London, appointing several Commanders of Horse for the defence of the King, Parliament, and city.--Thomason Tract index.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "To mr Geo. Thomason [illegible] Commissioner of ye ward of ffaringdon within"; [Illegible; a list of the names of the Commanders of Horse].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: London (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
